name: color-it
description: Flat colors for your Node.js strings.
author: Ionică Bizău <bizauionica@gmail.com> (https://ionicabizau.net)

blah.description: This library uses the flat colors taken from [flatuicolors.com](http://flatuicolors.com). For low-level libraries, check out [`flat-colors.js`](https://github.com/IonicaBizau/flat-colors.js) and [`node-couleurs`](https://github.com/IonicaBizau/node-couleurs).
